Medical laboratory technicians are vital to help physicians or clinicians...
...determine what exactly is going wrong with the patient.
We go through all of the specimens: the blood, the urine and whatnot...
...to help the doctor come up with a diagnosis.
The lab part of it is the best ever.
We have the opportunity to diagnose and view different parasites under the microscope.
I love getting in there and being able to draw blood...
...and looking at all of the different bacteria under the microscope.
